author: Felicia Schwartz
title: Tillerson Warns ISIS Will Return Without Continued Pressure
text:
KUWAIT CITY—U.S. Secretary of State Rex Tillerson warned members of an international coalition that the Islamic State extremist group would return if nations don’t continue to contribute to the fight as well as to stabilization efforts as the campaign proceeds to a new phase.

Mr. Tillerson acknowledged Tuesday that tensions between NATO allies Washington and Ankara have complicated the anti-Islamic State fight. Strains have flared as Turkey presses an offensive against fighters allied with U.S.-backed Kurds in the northwest...
